computePoolAddress((address,address,addr.details: The pool address is deterministically generated using CREATE2 with a salt derived from      the euler account address and provided salt parameter. This allows the pool address to be      predicted before deployment.

params.poolParams: Core pool parameters including vaults, account, and fee settings
params.salt: Unique value to generate deterministic pool address

returns._0: Address of the newly deployed pool

deployPool((address,address,address,uint.details: The pool address is deterministically generated using CREATE2 with a salt derived from      the euler account address and provided salt parameter. This allows the pool address to be      predicted before deployment.

params.params: Core pool parameters including vaults, account, fees, and curve shape
params.salt: Unique value to generate deterministic pool address

returns._0: Address of the newly deployed pool

poolByEulerAccount(address).details: Returns the pool address from the EulerAccountState mapping for the given holder

params.who: The address of the holder to query

returns._0: The address of the pool associated with the holder

pools().details: Returns the complete array of all pool addresses

returns._0: An array containing all pool addresses

poolsByPair(address,address).details: Returns the complete array of pool addresses for the given asset pair

params.asset0: The address of the first asset
params.asset1: The address of the second asset

returns._0: An array containing all pool addresses for the specified asset pair

poolsByPairLength(address,address).details: Returns the length of the pool array for the given asset pair

params.asset0: The address of the first asset
params.asset1: The address of the second asset

returns._0: The number of pools for the specified asset pair

poolsByPairSlice(address,address,uint256.details: Returns a subset of the pools array for the given asset pair from start to end index

params.asset0: The address of the first asset
params.asset1: The address of the second asset
params.end: The ending index of the slice (exclusive)
params.start: The starting index of the slice (inclusive)

returns._0: An array containing the requested slice of pool addresses for the asset pair

poolsLength().details: Returns the length of the allPools array

returns._0: The total number of pools deployed through the factory

poolsSlice(uint256,uint256).details: Returns a subset of the pools array from start to end index

params.end: The ending index of the slice (exclusive)
params.start: The starting index of the slice (inclusive)

returns._0: An array containing the requested slice of pool addresses

uninstallPool().details: This function removes the pool from the factory's tracking and emits a PoolUninstalled eventThe function can only be called by the Euler account that owns the poolIf no pool is installed for the caller, the function returns without any action

computePoolAddress((address,address,addr.notice: Compute the address of a new EulerSwap pool with the given parameters

deployPool((address,address,address,uint.notice: Deploy a new EulerSwap pool with the given parameters

poolByEulerAccount(address).notice: Returns the pool address associated with a specific holder

poolsByPair(address,address).notice: Returns all pools for a specific asset pair

poolsByPairLength(address,address).notice: Returns the number of pools for a specific asset pair

poolsByPairSlice(address,address,uint256.notice: Returns a slice of pools for a specific asset pair

poolsLength().notice: Returns the total number of deployed pools

poolsSlice(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a slice of all deployed pools

uninstallPool().notice: Uninstalls the pool associated with the Euler account
